title: MXene nanosheet-reinforced chitosan as a stable photothermal evaporator for efficient solar evaporation
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,3680-3687
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00617H, Review Article
Fuqiang Zhang, Zhiqiang Qi, Xiangsheng Han, Hongzhen Cai, Keyan Yang
We have developed a solar evaporator with high efficiency, superior stability, simple process and adaptability to complex water environments.
